name: K.R.O.B.I.F.
description:
Currently just a sandbox to show off the recent developments for KROBIF.

CONTROLS
WASD - Move
SPACE - Jump
E - Grapple
Q - Swap weapons
TAB - Swap to tool gun
Right click (While using tool gun)  - Open/close spawn menu
Left click - Shoot
LCTRL - Slow-mo

Discord: https://discord.gg/3VDj5fgjtA
